content: Mingyu Wu (吴明瑜) [IPADS] pub:members:mingyu_wu Table of Contents Mingyu Wu (吴明瑜) About Me Teaching Publications Students (advised or co-advised) Ph.D. candidates Graduate students Alumni Mingyu Wu (吴明瑜) Associate Professor IPADS Shanghai Jiao Tong University 800 Dongchuan Road, Minhang District, Shanghai, P.R.China Zip/Postal Code: 200240 Email: mingyuwu@sjtu.edu.cn About Me I am now an associate professor in School of Computer Science, Shanghai Jiao Tong University (SJTU). I received my Ph.D. degree in computer science from SJTU in 2020, advised by Prof. Haibo Chen. My research mainly focuses on building runtime systems for various scenarios, such as AI systems, cloud services, and mobile devices. Currently, I am also interested in building systems for new scenarios like AI-for-Science and mobile agents. I am looking for self-motivated students interested in building high-performance and reliable runtime systems. Drop me an E-mail if you want to join us! 中文主页 Google Scholar DBLP Teaching * Compilers, 2021-2025 Fall * Cloud Operating Systems: Design and Practice, 2022-2025 Spring * Computer System Design and Implementation, 2023-2025 Spring Publications [ACM TACO] Object-Aware Memory Compression for Smartphones.
